name: SML
body:
# Installation

To install SML tools in Eclipse, use the following update site:

`http://izontm.github.com/SML`

# Source code
The source code is available for download on the [project page](https://github.com/izontm/SML).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Situation Modeling and Rule-Based Situation Detection
